sequenceDiagram participant Network as ğŸŒ Network Interface participant PyShark as ğŸ“¡ PyShark Capture participant Features as ğŸ“Š Feature Extractor participant ML as ğŸ§  ML Models participant Monitor as ğŸ” Monitor Node participant Analysis as ğŸ“ˆ Analysis Node participant Decision as ğŸ’¡ Decision Node participant ChromaDB as ğŸ’¾ ChromaDB RAG participant Claude as ğŸ¤– Claude AI participant Action as âš¡ Action Node participant Prometheus as ğŸ“Š Prometheus Network->>PyShark: Raw network traffic PyShark->>PyShark: Capture 100 packets (Infra_WorkerNode) PyShark->>Monitor: Parsed packets (Infra_WorkerNode) Monitor->>Features: Extract features Features->>Features: Calculate 26 features
(Infra_IngressController) Features->>Monitor: Feature vector Monitor->>Analysis: Packets + Features Analysis->>ML: Feature vector ML->>ML: Isolation Forest prediction ML->>Analysis: Anomaly score (Infra_IngressController) alt Score < 0.8 (Infra_IngressController) Analysis->>Prometheus: Update metrics (Infra_EtcdCluster) Prometheus-->>Analysis: Metrics recorded else Score >= 0.8 (Infra_RedisCache) Analysis->>Decision: Anomaly detected! Decision->>ChromaDB: Query similar incidents ChromaDB->>ChromaDB: Semantic search
(Infra_IngressController) ChromaDB->>Decision: Top 3 similar incidents Decision->>Claude: Current anomaly + historical context Claude->>Claude: Analyze patterns
Make decision Claude->>Decision: Action + reasoning Decision->>Action: Execute decision Action->>Action: Apply action
(Infra_LoadBalancer) Action->>ChromaDB: Store new incident ChromaDB-->>Action: Incident stored Action->>Prometheus: Update metrics (Infra_RedisCache) Prometheus-->>Action: Metrics recorded end
